meanings.sent1: The cablegrams arrived from overseas with important news.
meanings.sent2: I received several cablegrams from my family abroad.
meanings.sent3: The cablegrams were like messengers bringing tidings from distant lands.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a bundle of cablegrams, each carrying a piece of her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The word 'cablegrams' painted a picture of communication across oceans.

meanings.definition: To send a message by cable
meanings.sent1: We cablegrams our updates to ensure quick delivery.
meanings.sent2: They cablegrams their business proposals to partners worldwide.
meanings.sent3: He cablegrams his love notes to his sweetheart in another country.
meanings.sent4: The idea cablegrams through the wires, reaching every corner of the network.
meanings.sent5: She cablegrams her thoughts, hoping they reach the recipient clearly.
